objectDesc.p: Papyrus, 5.2x4, 2 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 6 line(s) per column, 5-6 characters per line, written in Greek.

history.provenance: Excavated 1913-1914 by J. de M. Johnson at Sheikh-'Ibada, Miṣr.
Transferred to University of Oxford, Ashmolean Museum of Art and Archaeology at Oxford, England.
Moved 2001 to University of Oxford, Sackler Library at Oxford, England.

msIdentifier.msName: P. Ant. 2 54, University of Oxford, Sackler Library, Oxford, England.

sourceDesc.bibl: Barns, John W. B. and Henrik Zilliacus, The Antinoopolis Papyri, vol. 2, no. 54, p. 6-7, Egypt Exploration Society: London, England, 1960. OCLC 1191310.
